Class Asteroid

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.sofiainternal.Actor
      sofia.graphics.Shape

              sofia.micro.Actor
                  Asteroid

public class Asteroid
extends sofia.micro.Actor

The Asteroid class is the obstacle in space that destroys the ship and itself, when collided.

Version:
2.2.1-14 (2013.11.17)
Author:
Christopher Aska Toda (aska192)

 void wrapAround()
          The wrapAround() method is executed when the asteroid is at the edge of the world, then the asteroid would appear on the other opposite side of the space.

wrapAround

public void wrapAround()
The wrapAround() method is executed when the asteroid is at the edge of the world, then the asteroid would appear on the other opposite side of the space.
